channel.title: css on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in css on Blowfish

item.title: Advanced Customisation
item.description: There are many ways you can make advanced changes to Blowfish. Read below to learn more about what can be customised and the best way of achieving your desired result.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Blowfish, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.
